text: Aur tumhari auraton mein se jo haiz(menstruation) se mayous ho chuki hon unke maamle mein agar tum logon ko koi shak lahik hai to ( tumhe maloom ho ke ) unki iddat teen mahiney hai aur yahi hukum unka hai jinhein abhi haiz na aaya ho.Aur haamila(pregnant) aurton ki iddat ki hadd yeh hai ke unka waze hamal(delivery) ho jaye. Jo shakhs Allah se darey uske maamle mein woh sahulat paida kar deta hai
